item.title: Please help! will give mod to anyone who helps
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Mr.czar:

What he means is try looking in cachedownloader.java as well as signlink.java in your client… thos have the cache directorys. /data/ so on… like he said.

nononononono Here’s an example.
This is in ModelDecompresssor.java

DataInputStream indexFile = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream("./cache/models.idx")); DataInputStream dataFile = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream("./cache/models.dat"));
This is an example of what you might have because this loads from the cache if the cache is with the rest of the client files. Just change it.

Read full topic

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Shadow742000, post:12, topic:408960”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=510243.msg3702359#msg3702359 date=1312825548]

imsuperman, you never explained to me how to do it.

It doesn’t take a genius to do it. Just rewrite where the sprites and some methods that loads the Data folder, and other folders from the cache.

[/quote]
i dont know how to rewrite the stuff.[/quote]
Just rewrite how the client reads the folders in the cache. “./Data/”
